Name: Artificiality-人造物-
About the game: 'I can't recall anything...' This is a puzzle-solving adventure game. The player leads the main character Hiber to explore the truth of the story that exists in the lost memory. The game contains violence, bloody plots and pictures. '-- You've lost all your memories, haven't you?' 'It's just a small request.' 'I want to find -- the man who killed her.' Waking up outside the snowy capital, the dispossessed youth remembers only two things. His own name, Hiber. And... He must return to the Tower of Winter. But when you enter the capital, no matter who you ask, Hiber got only one answer: 'The Tower of Winter does not exist.' 'You can't run away, Mr. Hiber.' '... But can we take back those who die by accident?' Running away from the girls in uniform who were hunting him, Ion, a young man who calls himself a magician, offers Hiber a helping hand. ... Where to go? What has he forgotten? Trying to get it back, trying to get it back, In the darkness, Hiber and Ion began to act together... Players can use Hiber's eyes to switch 'fields of view,' interact with characters and 'emotions,' discover and use in-game clues to solve puzzles, and blaze a trail to the truth.
